<color=#66463e><outline color=#fff8ee><size=80>HOW TO PLAY</size></outline>

Collect items as quickly as possible.

<color=#e15333>3</c> target items appear below.

You can get higher scores if 
collecting different types of 
target items each time.

Cat Dog Peach

<color=#e15333>1</c> item will get "OK" when it has 
been collected, and finish <color=#e15333>3</c> items
will enter the next round.

</c>

<color=#66463e><size=80><outline color=fff8ee width=1>HOW TO PLAY</outline></size>

The faster collection,
the more score bonus.

Collection before the countdown
ends will earn bonus points.



You have <color=#e15333>${##}</c> wrong clicks,
game over if <color=#e15333>${##}</c> chances run out.

The game is completed after
<color=#e15333>${##}</c> rounds of tasks, the rest of 
the time will have score bonus.
